Summary: I was within five feet of the object that appeared suddenly leaving at indescribable sped. No sound, observed me and girlfriend for sometime. Quite uncomfortable. I want you to hear my story. No doubt they exist or time warp but real.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and i returned home after going out for a meal. It was dusk, sun setting behind us from our back porch. We heard back fire from a single engine plane flying very low over the tree tops in high density populated area; our house. While watching the plane less than a block away to the north, we notice a black object obscuring our view to the south. We walked off our porch up to the object within an arm length. Too nervous o do more. Please call me so i can tell you all.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Mankato
There were no other sightings in Mankato on or around June 3rd 1989
